review: No universal app for Win8/WinPhone 8.1 takes what is a great product and makes it mediocre. The menu is very good, the performance is superb. The funny thing, while I access Amazon Prime for most movies one of my biggest reasons for purchasing this device was to access NetFlix despite it being attached to a Sony Bravia Smart TV. Via the Sony system NexFlix is unusable, via the Fire TV Stick it is fluid and reliable.
